short_summary: Parks Canada Agency has a need for one (1) Dump Truck. The unit must be delivered to Canada Maintenance Compound #1, Compound Road, Jasper, AB T0E 1E0  ready for immediate use, with all specified equipment installed.
full_summary:
# Dump Truck Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS3814028266 
* Solicitation Number: WS3814028266 
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: January 11, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: March 16, 2023

## Contract Details

* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Description: Supply and delivery of one (1) dump truck
* UNSPSC Code: 25101601 - Dump trucks
* Input Bid Solicitation: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal
* Contract Start Date: September 29, 2023
* Contract End Date: None

## Classification and Trade Agreements

* The proposed contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Delivery and Inspection

* The dump truck must be delivered to Canada Maintenance Compound #1, Compound Road, Jasper, AB T0E 1E0, ready for immediate use, with all specified equipment installed.
* Final inspection will occur at the point of delivery.

## Contact Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contracting Authority:
	+ Ruwani Wall
	+ e-mail: ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## View the original tender notice on the Government of Canada’s procurement platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15102955?extsite=MTUxMDI5NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15102955?extsite=MTUxMDI5NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
